english.segment1: I am someone who got up again. I am someone unshakable. I have seen the earth spinning 'round. And now I understand
english.segment2: They used to keep you on the outside. Now you're the only survivor. You have spoken with the angels. And your face still shines. Just like mine
english.segment3: Chorus: We're The Glorious Ones. The Glorious Ones. Forever in the sun, we are. The Glorious Ones
english.segment4: And tonight we are the strangers. In the darkness underground. We have eternal things in out hands. And tomorrow we rise. So wise
